meanings.definition: Move in an orbit around (a celestial body).
meanings.sent2: Satellites orbiting the planet provide valuable data.
meanings.sent3: The spaceship started orbiting the star, playing a game of cosmic tag.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts kept orbiting around the idea of exploration.
meanings.sent5: The tiny spaceship was orbiting the giant gas planet, a dance of gravity and motion.

meanings.sent1: The children were orbiting around the teacher, eager to learn.
meanings.sent2: The planets orbiting the sun follow predictable paths.
meanings.sent3: The curious puppy was orbiting around the cat, hoping for a playmate.
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to orbit around the same worries every day.
meanings.sent5: The idea of success was orbiting around her mind, pushing her to work harder.

meanings.definition: Travel in an orbit around (a celestial body).
meanings.sent1: The spacecraft is orbiting Mars to collect data.
meanings.sent2: Comets orbiting the sun have long elliptical paths.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship was orbiting around the Earth, observing human behavior.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were orbiting around the idea of space travel.
meanings.sent5: The satellite was orbiting the moon, capturing stunning images of the lunar surface.
